message: I've been smoking Camels for years, and they're great smokes. Much better than the Cowboy Cigarettes. I would like to know if you would send me a copy of your newest Camel catalogs and I have a question about the old Camel cash. Can I use the old cash to buy new stuff? If you can, please send any coupons you can. Thank you for your time. Keep the Camels coming.
